definition: simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: With strong and thick bodies, the characters appear abstract and simple and their hands either stretch or clench.
sentences.chinese: 人物身條渾厚，手指若伸若握，抽象簡潔。

sentences.english: "Doctor McKee?" the man called in an even, sonorous voice.
sentences.chinese: “麥基醫生？”那個男人電話上的聲音均衡渾厚。

sentences.english: His voice is no longer young children, more powerful.
sentences.chinese: 他的聲音不再是當年稚嫩的童音，變得渾厚有力。

sentences.english: As a thin and weak individual, comparing with whole collectivity, I'm not important.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個單薄的個體，與渾厚的集體相比，我不重要。

sentences.english: Abrupt, a kind of simple and honest baritone waves to me.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，一種渾厚的男中音向我飄來。

sentences.english: She sang a wide range of musical notes with her powerful voice.
sentences.chinese: 她用她那渾厚有力的嗓音演唱各種類型的歌曲。

sentences.english: He's shorter than most of the other guys in his grade, and his voice hasn't deepened at all.
sentences.chinese: 他比同年級的學生要矮，聲音也不渾厚。

sentences.english: Every morning I can hear a rich voice of the baritone.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨，我都能聽到男中音渾厚的聲音。

sentences.english: The opera singer HAS a deep, Booming, masculine voice.
sentences.chinese: 這位歌劇演唱家有一副深沉而又渾厚有力的嗓音。

sentences.english: The folding surfaces of stone wall create vivid shadow and the obtuse angle stone makes the corner look more firm and powerful.
sentences.chinese: 轉角處鈍角轉折處理更增加了渾厚有力的建築感。

definition: simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
bold/upright and strong/vigorous/forceful (brush strokes)/sureness of touch
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
